name: Faraday Protocol [DEMO]
description:
Faraday Protocol is a first-person puzzle game that will test your wits and intelligence. Use the Bia-Tool, an ancient pistol-like relic of an alien civilization, to solve puzzles by bending energy and manipulating enigmatic machinery.

Features
  • Puzzle your way through the mysterious space station OPIS
  • Use the Bia-Tool to absorb and redistribute energy
  • Unravel the many mysteries of the station and its governing A.I. IRIS
  • Find hidden collectibles that reward especially attentive players
  • Experience a unique blend of retrofuturism
This is the DEMO version, the full game is available on Steam/GOG: Also available on Xbox, Play Station, and Nintendo Switch!
